replaceChineseChar

public static java.lang.String replaceChineseChar(java.lang.String s)
a Chinese character takes up two-char-space but only counts one char, this method replace the Chinese Character with "aa"(just arbitrary chosen here),with dealing with operations like String.subString(int beginIdx,int endIdx);

Parameters:
s -
Returns:
a String with all the Chinese Character in it replaced by "aa"
